summary: Conjure Animals let's mages or any player conjure a Spriggan, bear, or a Flaming Wolf
descriptionHtml: Conjure Animals let's mage's or any player able to conjure a Spriggan, bear, or a Flaming Wolf. There is more to come, but i was using my mage char when i realized that there is not that many conjure able's animals Â so i created this mod as a way to help me in battle. You will be able to find the spell tomes on a table in the "Drunken Huntsmen" in Whiterun.
author: Robotfinny
